title: The Look: March’s Best-Dressed List
excerpt: Here are the best-dressed celebrities of the month, including Rihanna, Millie Bobby Brown, Kendall Jenner, Jhené Aiko, and more.
text: Millie Bobby Brown Credit: Leonardo FernandezWhen: March 27Where: The Miami Open at Hard Rock Stadium in MiamiWhat: Jennifer Fisher hoops Why: If tennis is, in fact, the most romantic sport, why not break out the jewelry?Hailey BieberCredit: DUTCH/Bauer-GriffinWhen: March 26Where: Los Angeles What: The Row trench coat and heelsWhy: This is a timeless look if I’ve ever seen one. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowBella Hadid When: March 25Where: New York City What: A Valentino Garavani tote, a Guest In Residence cardigan, and a Kate Cate belt Why: Wearing a sweater from her sister’s brand is the definition of supportive.Rihanna Credit: DUTCH/Bauer-GriffinWhen: March 21Where: Los Angeles What: Citizens of Humanity jeans Why: It’s an instant yes. Rihanna would never steer me wrong. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowJhené AikoWhen: March 20Where: Cult Gaia’s Annual Nowruz Celebration for Persian New Year in Los AngelesWhat: Cult Gaia Why: See here: a true goddess dressed as such. Rachel Zegler When: March 17Where: Los AngelesWhat: Kurt Geiger heels Why: Maybe we should collectively agree that it’s perfectly fine to wear all black and nothing else. Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowSuki Waterhouse TheStewartofNYWhen: March 17Where: New York City What: Marc Jacobs sunglasses and an Isabel Marant coat, pants, and bootsWhy: Yet another compelling case for suede. She looks so cool, as always. Alessandra Ambrosio When: March 15Where: Los Angeles What: Mother Denim jeans Why: Couples that dress together stay together.Selah MarleyJason Lowrie/BFA.comWhen: March 13Where: A Louis Vuitton dinner at the Chelsea Hotel in New York City What: A Louis Vuitton Biker bag Why: New LV styles are just so easy to celebrate. Natasha Rothwell When: March 12Where: New York CityWhat: A Reformation dressWhy: Protect Belinda at all costs. Babara Palvin Credit: Aissaoui Nacer/BackgridAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowKatie Holmes When: March 7 Where: New York City What: A DeMellier bag Why: We’ve been fans of DeMellier for a while.Kendall Jenner When: March 6 Where: Los Angeles What: Ugg slides Why: This one is giving peak pandemic Zoom meeting uniform, no? html:
Millie Bobby Brown

When: March 27

Where: The Miami Open at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami

What: Jennifer Fisher hoops

Why: If tennis is, in fact, the most romantic sport, why not break out the jewelry?

Hailey Bieber

When: March 26

Where: Los Angeles

What: The Row trench coat and heels

Why: This is a timeless look if I’ve ever seen one.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Bella Hadid

When: March 25

Where: New York City

What: A Valentino Garavani tote, a Guest In Residence cardigan, and a Kate Cate belt

Why: Wearing a sweater from her sister’s brand is the definition of supportive.

Rihanna

When: March 21

Where: Los Angeles

What: Citizens of Humanity jeans

Why: It’s an instant yes. Rihanna would never steer me wrong.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Jhené Aiko

When: March 20

Where: Cult Gaia’s Annual Nowruz Celebration for Persian New Year in Los Angeles

What: Cult Gaia

Why: See here: a true goddess dressed as such.

Rachel Zegler

When: March 17

Where: Los Angeles

What: Kurt Geiger heels

Why: Maybe we should collectively agree that it’s perfectly fine to wear all black and nothing else.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Suki Waterhouse

When: March 17

Where: New York City

What: Marc Jacobs sunglasses and an Isabel Marant coat, pants, and boots

Why: Yet another compelling case for suede. She looks so cool, as always.

Alessandra Ambrosio

When: March 15

Where: Los Angeles

What: Mother Denim jeans

Why: Couples that dress together stay together.

Selah Marley

When: March 13

Where: A Louis Vuitton dinner at the Chelsea Hotel in New York City

What: A Louis Vuitton Biker bag

Why: New LV styles are just so easy to celebrate.

Natasha Rothwell

When: March 12

Where: New York City

What: A Reformation dress

Why: Protect Belinda at all costs.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Amanda Seyfried

When: March 10

Where: New York City

What: Gianvito Rossi boots

Why: This season, yellow is finally getting its moment.

Catherine O'Hara

When: March 8

Where: SXSW in Austin, Texas

What: Pucci

Why: Catherine! You shouldn’t have! I’m blown away.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Jenna Ortega

Now 25% Off

When: March 8

Where: SXSW in Austin, Texas

What: A Black House Black Market shirt and Christian Louboutin heels

Why: Everything looks cooler with little black sunglasses.

Babara Palvin

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Katie Holmes

When: March 7

Where: New York City

What: A DeMellier bag

Why: We’ve been fans of DeMellier for a while.

Kendall Jenner

When: March 6

Where: Los Angeles

What: Ugg slides

Why: This one is giving peak pandemic Zoom meeting uniform, no?

Eiza González

Philippine Leroy-Beaulieu

When: March 4

Where: Paris Fashion Week

What: Pomellato jewelry

Why: I’d generally like to see more opera gloves—and sunglasses at night.
